# STA 199 - Section 2 {#sta199-2 .unnumbered}

**Introduction to Data Science and Statistical Thinking (STA 199-002)**

In Spring 2022, this section of STA 199 is taught by [Prof. Jacob Smith](https://scholars.duke.edu/person/jacob.f.smith).

The TAs for the course are Eli Feder, Carson Garcia, Sara Lemus, Gaurav Sirdeshmukh, Emre Yurtbay, Zheyuan (Zoey) Liu, Nathan Varberg, and Aidan Gildea.

Go to the [**STA 199 - Section 2 course website**](https://sta199-spring2022.netlify.app/) for course specific information.
